name: Vorthropod
movement: walk 30 ft., swim 30 ft., climb 20 ft.
description: The Vorthropod is a medium-sized monstrosity with a formidable molten shell and robust physique, making it adapted to volcanic environments. It thrives in extreme heat and possesses powerful claw attacks.
memorable: Its ability to turn its shell into molten form and retaliate with fiery attacks makes it a formidable opponent in combat.
goals: To inhabit magma and lava environments while ambushing unsuspecting creatures.
relations: May be found in the company of other fire-aligned creatures or in volcanic areas.
environment: Volcanic terrain, near magma or lava flows.
strengths: Damage immunities to fire and poison, significant hit points, and powerful melee attacks.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, making it easily outsmarted and unable to engage socially.
attacks: Performs multiattacks with claws, dealing additional fire damage, and can unleash a devastating tail slap attack, causing fire damage in a wide area.
most_powerful_ability: Lava Bound: Allows it to exist outside of lava for limited time, affecting its form and defensive capabilities.
senses: Blindsight up to 10 feet allows it to detect nearby creatures without sight.
skills: Has a perception skill of +1, providing basic awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Able to camouflage itself in volcanic terrain.
Vulnerable to bludgeoning damage when its shell hardens outside of lava.
Can enter a long hibernation if remains outside of lava too long.
Attacks can deal both bludgeoning and fire damage.
Possesses a unique molten shell ability for retaliation.
test_queries: magma monster that ambushes in volcano
creature with molten shell and claws
